comments.comments_text: Goal! Arnaud Souquet (Nice) was in the right place at the right time to pounce on the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball home. It's 0:1.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Valentin Eysseric (Nice) saw red with that tackle. Andre Marriner won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
